. I heard that Yoi-chanan was looking for|this flower in the laboratory at Camiharmi|Castle. I was wondering if I could be of|

19.「避けてへん！ | そんな しょうもない思いちがいで| <pc>を 付き合わさせ: I'm not avoiding you! I'm not going to let a|<pc> get in the way of that|silly misunderstanding.
